<S%G1161>But<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G3361>Not<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> day, <S%G3379>lest<s%> there <S%G2071>be<s%> an <S%G2351>uproar<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G3015>leper<s%>, as <S%G846>he<s%> sat at <S%G2621>meat<s%>, there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> an alabaster <S%G211>box<s%> of <S%G3464>ointment<s%> of <S%G3487%G4101>spikenard<s%> very <S%G4185>precious<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G4937>brake<s%> the <S%G211>box<s%>, and <S%G2708>poured<s%> it <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> that had <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4314>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G1519%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G684>waste<s%> of the <S%G3464>ointment<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G4097>sold<s%> for more <S%G1883>than<s%> three <S%G5145>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pence<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have been <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they murmured <S%G1690>against<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Let <S%G863><s%> her <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G863><s%> ; why <S%G5101><s%> trouble ye <S%G2873%G3930><s%> her <S%G846><s%> ? she hath wrought <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G5463>glad<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G694>money<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G2122>conveniently<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he sendeth <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Go ye <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> there shall meet <S%G528><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> : follow <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> wheresoever <S%G3699%G1437><s%> he shall go in <S%G1525><s%> , say ye <S%G2036><s%> to the goodman of the house <S%G3617%G3754><s%> , The Master <S%G1320><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> , Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the guestchamber <S%G2646><s%> , where <S%G3699><s%> I shall eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> ?

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> will shew <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large <S%G3173><s%> upper room <S%G508><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> and prepared <S%G2092><s%> : there <S%G1563><s%> make ready <S%G2090><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they made <S%G2090>ready<s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1096>in<s%> the <S%G3798>evening<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>.

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> goeth <S%G5217><s%> , as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed <S%G3860><s%> ! good <S%G2570><s%> were it <S%G2258><s%> for that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G1080><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> been born <S%G1080><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%>, and when he had given <S%G2168>thanks<s%>, he <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drank<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when they had sung an <S%G5214>hymn<s%>, they went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> am risen <S%G1453><s%> , I will go before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> .

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532%G1487>Although<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> shall be <S%G4624>offended<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G5564>place<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, Sit ye <S%G2523><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> , while <S%G2193><s%> I shall pray <S%G4336><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> exceeding sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> : tarry ye <S%G3306><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> watch <S%G1127><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he went <S%G4281>forward<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%>, and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2076>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%>, the <S%G5610>hour<s%> might <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Watch ye <S%G1127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> , lest <S%G3363><s%> ye enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> . The spirit <S%G4151><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is ready <S%G4289><s%> , but <S%G1161><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is weak <S%G772><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> he went <S%G565>away<s%>, and <S%G4336>prayed<s%>, and <S%G2036>spake<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>.
